content:
staff ReportApril  

Take Back the Night has been rescheduled to Friday due to rain on Thursday and has been renamed Take Back the Day PERIOD

The Sexual Assault Counseling and Information Service will host Take Back the Day alongside its tabling event called SACIS on the Steps PERIOD

Both events will be at the Doudna Steps from  a.m PERIOD to  p.m. with the Take Back the Day rally and march starting at  according to a post from the SACIS Instagram page PERIOD

Those who attend will have the opportunity to win prizes and play some games PERIOD

According to the Take Back the Night Foundation the event is meant to create safe communities and respectful relationships through awareness events and initiatives. take Back the Night is a part of National Sexual Assault Awareness Month and is sponsored by Student Government Sexual Violence Prevention Team EIU Division of Student Affairs EIU Office of Civil Rights and DiversityTitle X SACIS and HOPE PERIOD

The News Staff can be reached at  or emailprotected PERIOD
